<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_sigh_ausleihsyst_renting</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_sigh_ausleihsyst_renting">returnedCHANGESTO^EQ<item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="returned" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESTO" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CalculateAmountAfterUpdateALTEVERSION</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var grEquipment = new GlideRecord("x_sigh_ausleihsyst_equipment");
	//gs.info("vor if");
	if (grEquipment.get(current.equipment)){
		//gs.info("in if");
		var amount = parseInt(grEquipment.getValue("amount"));
		//gs.info("amount is", amount);
		amount = amount+1;
		grEquipment.setValue("amount",amount);
		grEquipment.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>haris.ogresevic@alumni.fh-aachen.de</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-09 01:38:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1deff84e1b315910b342dc61ab4bcbe2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CalculateAmountAfterUpdateALTEVERSION</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AusleihSystem" source="x_sigh_ausleihsyst">ce31d7851b35d5107165fdd49b4bcb87</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AusleihSystem">ce31d7851b35d5107165fdd49b4bcb87</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1deff84e1b315910b342dc61ab4bcbe2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-12 18:18:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1deff84e1b315910b342dc61ab4bcbe2"/></record_update>
